title: Update Visual Trust image URLs for positions 2, 3, 4, and 6

requirements.text: Update `frontend/src/components/sections/VisualTrustSection.tsx` so the Visual Trust grid loads the user-provided external image URLs for positions #2, #3, #4, and #6 (2nd, 3rd, 4th, and 6th items in the `images` array), replacing the currently configured URLs/asset for those positions while keeping the existing layout, ImageWithFallback behavior, and captions intact.

quotes:
2.https://i.postimg.cc/K81SGhQW/1771014909125.jpg
3.https://i.postimg.cc/tTt8SqCX/IMG-20260214-021154.jpg
4.https://i.postimg.cc/XYfKyp2n/IMG-20260214-021212.jpg
6.https://i.postimg.cc/kMHyrr6n/IMG-20260214-043956.jpg
Replace the given url with respective numbering of image position according to numbering from second,third,fourth, and sixth

acceptanceCriteria: Visual Trust image #6 uses `https://i.postimg.cc/kMHyrr6n/IMG-20260214-043956.jpg` (as an external URL, consistent with the other external images).
Visual Trust image #5 remains unchanged from its current configuration.
Remove or update the existing TODO comment about the missing 6th image URL so it no longer claims the 6th URL is missing.

constraints: Do not edit any files under the frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the existing Visual Trust section layout, captions, and `ImageWithFallback` usage unchanged aside from updating the specified image sources.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not redesign the Visual Trust section UI.
Do not change Visual Trust captions unless required for the URL update.
Do not add new images or regenerate static assets for this change.
